CardPickup

Class Graph

  • java.lang.Object
    • CardPickup.Graph

  • public class Graph
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates graphs of nodes that contain cards and possible cards

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Graph(int graphName)
      Constructor used by Game master to initialize graph.

                            int neighborIndex,
                            int[][] adjacencyMatrix)
        Returns boolean validating a node to be eligible for Neighbor or not
        Parameters:

        neighborIndex - An integer indicates neighbor node id
        adjacencyMatrix - A two dimensional array for adjacency

      • saveGraph

        public void saveGraph(boolean usePossibleCardSet)
        Print graph in a file
        Parameters:
        usePossibleCardSet - when true saves to name.hidden and saves the possible card set instead of the card

        public void saveGraph()
        Default save of graph without possible cards

        Generates a random graph

      • generateCopyGraph

        public Node[] generateCopyGraph()
        This method should never be called before generateGraph()
        Returns:
        a copy of the graph with the true card and possible cards on each node

      • generateHiddenGraph

        public Node[] generateHiddenGraph()
        This method should never be called before generateGraph()
        Returns:
        a copy of the graph without the true card on each node

      • getNodes

        public Node[] getNodes()
        Returns the nodes
        Returns:
        the nodes
